testcase.name: SC_01_Validate Login positive flow
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the application URL "https://pt.tommy.com/men"..........passed When I enter valid login credentials........................................passed Then I should logged in successfully in the application.....................passed

testcase.name: SC_02_Validate Login negative flow with invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the application URL "https://pt.tommy.com/men"..........passed When I enter invalid "email" in login credentials...........................passed Then Application should display "username and password don't match" error message.passed And I provide empty value in "email" textbox................................passed Then Application should display "You need to fill in this field" below "email" textbox.passed And I close the sigin dialog................................................passed And I enter invalid "password" in login credentials.........................passed Then Application should display "username and password don't match" error message.passed And I provide empty value in "password" textbox.............................passed Then Application should display "You need to fill in this field" below "password" textbox.passed And I close the sigin dialog................................................passed
